mean_cn: adj. 确定的，确凿的，必然的，某一
mean_en: used to say that something will definitely happen or that someone will definitely do something
word_etyma: cert确实 + ain形容词后缀 → certain 确信的
short_phrase: She is certain about her answer.
sentence: This actor is certain that he will win the award.
sentence_trans: 这个演员很确信可以获奖。
